item.description:
The day officially starts at 1 PM but if you want to help set up anchors come at around noon. I will be in the paring lot at 1PM to meet any new climbers. Call my cell if you don't see me (617 501-6217.) Please bring water and any other basics. Bring any climbing stuff that you might have like harness, shoes... E mail if you need a ride. We will try to figure out a carpool system before Sunday. For example, I can pick people up at 11:00 AM from Porter Square red line.

Driving to Quincy Quarries. Take exit 8 on HW 93. I suggest looking at a google map. It's confusing from the South. Just follow the signs.
Bring a smile...
Geoff
item.how_to_find_us: Call my cell 617 501-6217. Ask for Geoff. I will try to wear something bright.
item.why: I'm hopin the weather stays nice. The quarries are a great place to practice your outdoor climbing.
item.name: Quincy Quarries Sunday.
